data.title: UFC Fight Night: Tybura vs Spivac 2: Date, schedule, card and all about Saturday's fight
data.meta_description: After international events in Manchester and Abu Dhabi, the UFC returns to U.S. soil for UFC Vegas 95, featuring a highly anticipated heavyweight rematch between Poland's Marc
data.text:
After international events in Manchester and Abu Dhabi, the UFC returns to U.S. soil for UFC Vegas 95, featuring a highly anticipated heavyweight rematch between Poland's Marcin Tybura and Moldova's Serghei Spivac.

The bout will headline the event on Saturday, August 10, at the UFC Apex in Las Vegas.

Tybura vs. Spivac: A rematch three years in the making

Marcin Tybura and Serghei Spivac first met in the octagon in February 2020, where Tybura secured a unanimous decision victory, snapping a two-fight losing streak.

This time, the stakes are different. Tybura, now 39, enters the fight with momentum, having won three of his last four bouts. His recent success, marked by an 8-2 record over his last 10 fights, reflects his experience and ability to capitalize on his opponents' mistakes.

Serghei Spivac, on the other hand, has seen mixed results since his loss to Tybura. After a three-fight winning streak, Spivac faced a setback in September 2023 when he was defeated by Ciryl Gane in Paris, bringing his professional record to 16-4. Despite the loss, Spivac remains a formidable contender, eager to avenge his earlier defeat to Tybura.

A clash of ranked heavyweights

This matchup is evenly poised, with Tybura ranked eighth in the UFC heavyweight division and Spivac close behind at ninth. The rematch promises to be an intense showdown, with both fighters looking to solidify their positions in the heavyweight rankings.

How to Watch UFC Fight Night: Tybura vs. Spivac 2 in the USA

Fans in the United States can catch UFC Vegas 95 live on ESPN and ESPN+. The event will take place at the UFC Apex in Las Vegas, with the main card starting at 7:00 pm Eastern Time. The preliminary bouts are scheduled to begin at 5:00 pm.

UFC Vegas 95: Tybura vs. Spivac 2 Fight Card

The event will feature a mix of emerging talents and established fighters across several divisions:

Main card

Marcin Tybura vs Serghei Spivac

Damon Jackson vs Chepe Mariscal

Danny Barlow vs Nikolay Veretennikov

Chris Gutierrez vs Quang Le

Yana Santos vs Chelsea Chandler

Toshiomi Kazama vs Charalampos Grigoriou

Preliminary Card
